title: MyTargets Archery
summary: Helps you manage your archery scores.
description: MyTargets is a free and even open source archery app, which helps you manage your archery scores.Features* Intuitive and easy to use* Beautiful Material Design* Manage equipment (bows, arrows)* Scoresheet (with print functionality for Android 4.4 and above)* Android Wear support* 25 Target Faces (including Field and 3D)* Support for several scoring styles* Statistics* Saved Sight Marks* Supports standard roundsFor Experts* Track the performance of individual arrows* Track weather conditions like wind speed and direction* You can even create your own custom standard roundsTranslationsThe app is already available in over 20 languages. If your language is not yet supported or you spotted some mistakes in your translation, you can easily translate the app yourself on the following websitehttps://crowdin.com/project/mytargetsCommunity and Beta TestIf you want to participate in discussions regarding the future development of the app, you can join our G+ Community.Members of the group also have the option to try out the latest beta versions of the app. Therefore if you can't wait to try out new features this is the place for you :)https://plus.google.com/communities/102686119334423317437ProblemsIf you find any bugs or you have ideas for new features you can either contact me directly via Mail or use the following ticket tracking system https://github.com/DreierF/MyTargets/issues
descriptionHTML:
MyTargets is a free and even open source archery app, which helps you manage your archery scores.

Features
* Intuitive and easy to use
* Beautiful Material Design
* Manage equipment (bows, arrows)
* Scoresheet (with print functionality for Android 4.4 and above)
* Android Wear support
* 25 Target Faces (including Field and 3D)
* Support for several scoring styles
* Statistics
* Saved Sight Marks
* Supports standard rounds

For Experts
* Track the performance of individual arrows
* Track weather conditions like wind speed and direction
* You can even create your own custom standard rounds

Translations
The app is already available in over 20 languages. If your language is not yet supported or you spotted some mistakes in your translation, you can easily translate the app yourself on the following website
https://crowdin.com/project/mytargets

Community and Beta Test
If you want to participate in discussions regarding the future development of the app, you can join our G+ Community.
Members of the group also have the option to try out the latest beta versions of the app. Therefore if you can't wait to try out new features this is the place for you :)
https://plus.google.com/communities/102686119334423317437

Problems
If you find any bugs or you have ideas for new features you can either contact me directly via Mail or use the following ticket tracking system https://github.com/DreierF/MyTargets/issues
comments: Really very good. many years ago I wrote a Visual Basic application for iPaq (Archery Logbook) with many many things equals to this app.  This one is very well done, its easy to use, fast to record shots, and provides very useful information. I Like very much the ability to record the order and the number of the arrows then you can see groups made by arrow, and/or shooting order. You can improve your shooting, fine tune your equipment, and adjust your sight scope much better and precise. Using this application correctly makes your training sessions double efficiency. Thanks for this contribution to archery and.... When is going to be available for IOS devices too?
Great app! Very good for tracking your progress and easy to use. I recommend this app for new and experienced archers! 10/10 aka X
Great app to keep scores on. Able to customize almost everything and tracks your progress. Love it
Any chance you guys could make a vitals on an animal with an 11 ring 10 outer 8 then 5 for the body? That could help for out 3d practice
Great app but doesn't show 6 ring target for compound no matter what I do
recentChanges: - More performant Scoreboard (with PDF export and signing)
- Comments can now be added to every training, round and end
- Timer can now be used independently of a training
- Timer now also works when the screen is locked
- Timer and input stay on top of the lockscreen
